document_title: Benign kidney tumors: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content: Benign kidney tumors are almost always not life-threatening, but unusual symptoms can affect the patient's quality of daily life. Even though kidney tumors are benign, experts recommend that you still make an appointment with your doctor as soon as you detect unusual signs for advice and instructions on some health monitoring and care measures. Because in many cases tumors can become malignant over time and early detection has great significance for the effectiveness of later treatment.
subsection_title: u than lanh tinh.json. Are benign kidney tumors dangerous?
subsection_data:
u than lanh tinh.json. Are benign kidney tumors dangerous?
Benign kidney tumors are almost always not life-threatening, but unusual symptoms can affect the patient's quality of daily life. Even though kidney tumors are benign, experts recommend that you still make an appointment with your doctor as soon as you detect unusual signs for advice and instructions on some health monitoring and care measures. Because in many cases tumors can become malignant over time and early detection has great significance for the effectiveness of later treatment.
